wikipedia_page.main: Jack Mackreth (born 13 April 1992) is an English footballer who plays as a winger for Warrington Town.

response: Dudley signed for another National League side on loan Macclesfield Town, in January 2017. He joined Macclesfield as part of the transfer of Jack Mackreth to Bury.
